 Guiledart smiled. He could hear through halucinagens
comm. He had connected them togeather so to hear what
was going on. "Whats wrong halucinagen? Not getting
along?" Apocalypse stood up. "Lets go now im sick of
waiting!" He and his troops stepped out of the base
and blasted off towards cyngar's like planned.
Guiledart continued to work on the defences.
--- Rudra656@... wrote:
> ::Cygnar::
>     "BE SILENT INFERIOR BEING!"  He glares directly
> at Halucigen.  In an 
> instant he raises his gun aiming it at his torso.
>
